comments: This contract is a call-up against a Public Works and Government Services Canada procurement tool/This contract includes one or more amendments/Consultant to conduct Phase I environmental site assessments at Kettle and Stoney Point First Nation, Mississauga of Scugog First Nation, Missinabie Cree First Nation and Chippewas of Georgina Island First Nation. A soil sampling program and Beausoleil First Nation (Hope Island), and an environmental site assessment Phase II at Mohawks of the Bay of Quinte Turton Penn Property, will also be conducted.
